title: Hebden Bridge
description: Hebden Bridge is a market town in the Upper Calder Valley in West Yorkshire, England. It is 8 miles west of Halifax and 14 miles north-east of Rochdale, at the confluence of the River Calder and the Hebden Water. The town is the largest settlement in the civil parish of Hebden Royd.

items.name: The Afghan Rug Shop
items.description: The Afghan Rug Shop in Hebden Bridge can call itself unique for several reasons. It’s believed to be the only rug shop outside Afghanistan itself that sells rugs solely from that country.

items.name: Totally Awesome
items.description: Based in vibrant Hebden Bridge and the Historic Piece Hall in Halifax, Totally Awesome offers a fun shopping experience allowing you to try many of the products on offer, products which often can’t be found on the high street.

items.name: The Egg Factory
items.address: Windsor Works Adj. Unit,, Victoria Rd, Hebden Bridge HX7 8JX
items.description: The Egg Factory is a creative co-working space in Hebden Bridge, West Yorkshire. Become part of our community today and work alongside like-minded creatives to help your small business flourish.
